text: The 1982 Bexley Council election took place on 6 May 1982 to elect members of Bexley London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Conservative party stayed in overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1982 Category:1982 London Borough council elections Category:May 1982 events
title: 1982 Bexley London Borough Council election
